name: Alexander Karelas's Homepage
body:
### Work
For the past 3 years I've been working for [Zoo Bytes](http://www.zoo.gr/), a famous Greek online-gaming company. There, I program in Perl, MySQL and sometimes a bit of HTML/JavaScript.

### Personal projects
In my spare time, I like to work on my own projects. KJabberd, XML::MyXML and I have a couple more that have not been released yet. I use AngularJS a lot.

### KJabberd
[KJabberd](https://github.com/akarelas/KJabberd) is a simple Jabber server (written in Perl), especially designed to be integrated with websites. I hope to make it clusterable one day.

### XML::MyXML
[XML::MyXML](https://metacpan.org/module/XML::MyXML::II) is a nice and easy Perl module, for parsing and creating XML documents.

### Contact
